concept.title: Variant Specific Startup Overview
concept.shortdesc: This overview briefly describes the variant specific startup utility.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The variant specific startup utility is the first part of the kernel to run.

section.title: Variant specific startup library details
section.p: The DLL that provides the functionality and the library to which your code must link is identified below.

section.title: Description
section.p: The variant specific startup utility is the first part of the kernel that runs. It runs right after the bootstrap.
kc_exe.lib is built as a separate library and then linked in so that it is run at the very beginning of ekern.exe.

li.p: ROM header address passed in by bootstrap
super page address passed in by bootstrap.

section.title: Using the variant specific startup library
section.p: The DLL is made up of these template files:
These can be found in the directory template\template_variant\specific\.
The source files in the template_assp folder are quite well commented and should provide ample information on usage.
